name: Plaboscope
title: Exam preparation android quiz app
description: This app holds a special place in my heart as it was the whole reason I started my tech journey. I wanted to build a free resource for other doctors who were sitting the PLAB examination after I had just written it while using a lot of different resources. It serves questions and answers and includes many features tailored towards passing the exam. It is an android application initially written in Java but converted to Kotlin, using an MVVM pattern with a firebase backend.

name: EDD
title: Pregnancy information calculator for medical professionals
description: This is an android application that solved the very simple problem of calculating a pregnant womanâ€™s expected date of delivery  or estimated gestational age. I found all the solutions available clunky and a lot of my colleagues and other users agree with me.

name: Spot
title: Work automation tool that makes spreadsheets
description: This is an application I wrote in python that integrates with Telegram to allow myself and my work colleagues to generate pdf reports. I use firebase to save user data and a headless chromium browser to preview templates and it is hosted on an amazon EC2 instance.

name: Ibiyemi
title: Retail inventory and sales application
description: A Fullstack Django web application with a React frontend. This has gone through many iteration cycles based on user feedback and this taught me a very valuable lesson in putting customers' needs first. I thoroughly enjoyed working on it.

name: Tellerbase
title: School management and payment processing application
description: A secondary school management and payment application built with my amazing cofounders. Find out more about the amazing work we did below.
